subsection_name: tien-tieu-duong.json_4_How long does it take for prediabetes to become diabetes?
subsection_content: Prediabetes can progress to diabetes or not depending on a scientific diet and good blood sugar control. However, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said: without a plan to adjust diet and lifestyle, 37% of people with diabetes will develop type 2 diabetes after 4 years. If you change your lifestyle, the time it takes for a person with prediabetes to develop into diabetes is 10 years. Even if you follow a healthy diet and have regular health check-ups, you can completely reverse prediabetes. (4)
subsection_title: tien tieu duong.json. How long does it take for prediabetes to become diabetes?
subsection_data:
tien tieu duong.json. How long does it take for prediabetes to become diabetes?
Prediabetes can progress to diabetes or not depending on a scientific diet and good blood sugar control. However, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said: without a plan to adjust diet and lifestyle, 37% of people with diabetes will develop type 2 diabetes after 4 years. If you change your lifestyle, the time it takes for a person with prediabetes to develop into diabetes is 10 years. Even if you follow a healthy diet and have regular health check-ups, you can completely reverse prediabetes. (4)
